snippet: Mitt Romney’s charge that President Obama is encouraging welfare dependency by ending federal work requirements is false and divisive.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Mitt Romney for accusing Pres Obama of attempting to gut welfare reform by ending federal work requirements; argues statement is a blatant falsehood that indicates Romney's desperation to gain popularity among blue-collar voters.
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney’s charge that President Obama is encouraging welfare dependency by ending federal work requirements is false and divisive.

headline.print_headline: Mr. Romney Hits Bottom on Welfare
headline.seo: Mr. Romney Hits Bottom on Welfare
headline.main: Mr. Romney Hits Bottom on Welfare
